Definition: The given tweet will be classified into one of three categories: (1) 'Hate Speech', (2) 'Offensive', or (3) 'Neither'. 'Hate Speech' includes threatening statements or sometimes call for violence. 'Offensive' statements are those that simply offend someone. 'Neither' is when the tweet doesn't fall into either the 'Hate Speech' or 'Offensive' category.
